ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Velious Factions?
ygData.msgSnippet: Not that I know of, but I kind of doubt it.  The folks at VI have said from the start that faction would make a real difference here, meaning (IMO) that there
ygData.messageBody:
Not that I know of, but I kind of doubt it. The folks at VI have said from
the start that faction would make a real difference here, meaning (IMO) that
there would be no way you could "ride the fence" and con well to all 3.

-=B=-
45th
The Rathe
----- Original Message -----
From: "Cyr, Thierry" <thierry.cyr@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, December 21, 2000 3:39 PM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Velious Factions?


> I guess that settles it... Death to the oversized barbarians.
>
> One last thought though, Do you think that by questing it is possible to
> raise all 3, in a sense that the quests will counter the negative and add
on
> to the good side?
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Bill Mann [mailto:dabard@...]
> Sent: December 21, 2000 4:41 PM
> To: eqbards@egroups.com
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Velious Factions?
>
>
> Kill a dorf = good giant and bad dorf
> Kill a giant = good dorf, good dragon, and bad giant
> Kill a dragon = good giant and bad dragon
>
>
> -=B=-
> 45th
> The Rathe
